main event: Sgt. Donald R. Berger observed an unidentified airborne object while operating a searchlight for publicity purposes on 19 August 1949.
interesting points: The object changed color from phosphorescent to bluish when illuminated by the searchlight,The object remained visible with a luminous appearance when the light beam was removed,It was observed to be stationary for approximately three and a half hours,The sighting was reported by several hundred people in Cincinnati,Although not officially released, the incident was mentioned in a daily newspaper.
witness description: Sgt. Donald R. Berger and several hundred people in the city
